headline: Cyndi Lauper Announces Las Vegas Residency at The Colosseum at Caesars Palace
summary: LAS VEGAS, October 06, 2025--Cyndi Lauper has announced her first-ever Las Vegas residency. Cyndi Lauper: Live In Las Vegas will take place at The Colosseum at Caesars Palace from April 24 through May 2, 2026. Vegas will become "Cyn City" next spring, when Lauper brings her widely praised Girls Just Wanna Have Fun show to town for this special run, an opportunity for fans who missed her Farewell Tour to celebrate one last time. Full information on ticketing and presales is below, with general on
